column4: My CD is much faster than my net connection, so apt-get (from a server somewhere) is going to take forever (>400MB). I wanted to use the CD as the repository to do the install, but want it to all be copasetic(?) with the existing distro.  This is just over the edge of my knowledge/understanding as a linux newbie.
you'll be getting moderately old stuff.  You will end up upgrading a fair fraction of it over the 'net anyway
not sure if you'll save very much.
